adminB2c.title: Franchisee Admin System (B2C)
adminB2c.description: Led Admin and order platform: Vue 3/TypeScript SPA, CI/CD automation. Redesigned franchisee admin features from recurring CS patterns—reduced repeat CS by 90%+ and shortened response time. Generalized the structure and scaled to full franchisee admin.

adminB2b.title: Internal Admin System (B2B)
adminB2b.description: Unified internal tools and rebuilt the PHP admin into a Vue-based SPA. Added menu settings, ad exposure limits, and permission control. Drove user-centered improvements from CS and engineering feedback. Built GitHub Actions + AWS (CDN, Route53, S3) CI/CD for overseas domains.

hyatt.title: Hyatt — Order Tablet & Master Tablet | Admin
hyatt.description: Order Tablet: Defined new requirements for the hotel ordering domain and designed/implemented order flows and data structures in collaboration with planning, backend, and POS teams. Designed and implemented complex ordering UIs including multi-level options, set menus, and custom themes. Developed recursive parsing logic to overcome limitations of legacy POS single-depth data, and designed cart option-change handling with multi-level option state injection. Tech stack: Vue 3, TypeScript, Pinia, Vite, Socket.IO, i18n. Admin: Customized the existing admin system to meet Hyatt-specific operational requirements. Redesigned APIs and data structures to flexibly support hotel-specific policies such as product duplication, set menus, order tablet customization, and theme configuration. Tech stack: Vue 3, TypeScript, Pinia, Element Plus, Vite.
